text: Ikibi kigaritse catumye bagurisha imitima yabo, nikurya kwanka ivyamanuwe n’Imana hejuru y’ukugira inzigo yuko Imana yabamanuriye imihezagiro yayo kubo yishakiye ku bantu bayo, kubera ivyo rero bakwiriye kuronswa ishavu rizoba hejuru y’irindi shavu, nabo bahakanyi b’Imana y’ukuri bazoronka ibihano bizoba tetereza
